title: One Click Trade Mark Website
subTitle: This is a subtitle
description: I developed the One Click Trade Mark website to provide clients with an easy-to-use platform for registering their trademarks online. This solution streamlines the registration process, allowing users to navigate steps with minimal effort. The site includes secure payment options and real-time status updates, enhancing client satisfaction and promoting efficient trademark management.

skills: Programming: Java, Thymeleaf, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, MySQL
Cloud Services: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, AWS Load Balancer, Route 53
Other: Agile Methodology, SOLID principles, MVC pattern
jd: Verified third-party APIs including IP Australia API, PayPal API, and Google Location Autocomplete API, and integrated them into the website.
Designed and created the database in AWS RDS.
Checked web standard validation in alignment with W3C web standards.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Wrote technical documentation and end-user manuals.
